connection.title: Internet connection found
connection.subtitle: Please disconnect from Internet
connection.message:
We found a internet connection.
Please disconnect from internet to start with Shamirs Wallet.

information.title: Minimize risks
information.subtitle: To minimize possible risks, we recommend that you disconnect from the Internet by turning off mobile data and your WLAN. Please uninstall all apps that pose a security risk. There are apps that can take a photo or video of your screen. Shamir's Wallet does not connect to the Internet, does not take photos or videos and does not need any other apps to work.
